de.esoco.ewt.component

Class ListControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.ewt.component.Component
      • de.esoco.ewt.component.Control
        • de.esoco.ewt.component.ListControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.esoco.lib.property.HasId<java.lang.String>, de.esoco.lib.property.MultiSelection, de.esoco.lib.property.SingleSelection
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    List, ListBox

    public abstract class ListControl
extends Control
implements de.esoco.lib.property.SingleSelection, de.esoco.lib.property.MultiSelection
    Base class for components that contain a list of strings. This control cannot be instantiated directly but is a base class for list-based controls like List.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ListControl.GwtListBox
      A subclass of ListBox that implements the ListControl.IsListControlWidget interface.
      static interface  ListControl.IsListControlWidget
      Contains the required methods for list widgets.
      static class  ListControl.ListControlWidgetFactory
      Widget factory for this component.

      • setSelection

        public void setSelection(int nIndex)
        Sets the index of the currently selected list element. For subclasses that allow complete deselection an index value of -1 will deselect all elements.
        Specified by:
        setSelection in interface de.esoco.lib.property.SingleSelection
        Parameters:
        nIndex - The index of the new selected element or -1 for none

        Parameters:
